Text:
scottvenzel, you don't get enough credit for how great of an uploader you are. The quality of your uploads is fucking outstanding!

About the DVD, - most of us know that footwork is the most important thing in mixed martial arts (especially Muay Thai), but it is even more important in dancing since you have to coordinate with your partner. This is a bit more advanced, but hey, keep enhancing your footwork knowledge and experience.
